properties.name: spring.security.user.name
properties.description: Value of the default user name of eChempad (//RF it transforms magically to amarine).

properties.name: signals.baseURL
properties.description: Contains the URL where the API REST of Signals is located.

properties.name: signals.APIKeys.path
properties.description: Contains a path to a file that contains the API key for a testing user.

properties.name: signals.APIKeys.filename
properties.description: Filename for a file containing the API key. Used in testing.
